rules.description: Hyper: Arc Browser (l: Little Arc - u: copy URL as markdown - z: Reopen last closed tab)
left_command alone -> ⌘ + tab to last app
In Arc browser: left_control alone -> ctrl + tab to last tab

to.shell_command: /usr/bin/env bash -lc 'id=$(/opt/homebrew/bin/yabai -m query --windows --window | /opt/homebrew/bin/jq -r .id); /opt/homebrew/bin/yabai -m window --space prev; tgt=$(/opt/homebrew/bin/yabai -m query --windows --window $id | /opt/homebrew/bin/jq -r .space); /opt/homebrew/bin/yabai -m space --focus $tgt; sleep 0.06; /opt/homebrew/bin/yabai -m window --focus $id'

/usr/bin/env bash -lc 'id=$(/opt/homebrew/bin/yabai -m query --windows --window | /opt/homebrew/bin/jq -r .id); /opt/homebrew/bin/yabai -m window --space next; tgt=$(/opt/homebrew/bin/yabai -m query --windows --window $id | /opt/homebrew/bin/jq -r .space); /opt/homebrew/bin/yabai -m space --focus $tgt; sleep 0.06; /opt/homebrew/bin/yabai -m window --focus $id'

/usr/bin/env bash -lc 'id=$(/opt/homebrew/bin/yabai -m query --windows --window | /opt/homebrew/bin/jq -r .id); /opt/homebrew/bin/yabai -m window --space 1; /opt/homebrew/bin/yabai -m space --focus 1; sleep 0.06; /opt/homebrew/bin/yabai -m window --focus $id'

/usr/bin/env bash -lc 'id=$(/opt/homebrew/bin/yabai -m query --windows --window | /opt/homebrew/bin/jq -r .id); /opt/homebrew/bin/yabai -m window --space 2; /opt/homebrew/bin/yabai -m space --focus 2; sleep 0.06; /opt/homebrew/bin/yabai -m window --focus $id'

/usr/bin/env bash -lc 'id=$(/opt/homebrew/bin/yabai -m query --windows --window | /opt/homebrew/bin/jq -r .id); /opt/homebrew/bin/yabai -m window --space 4; /opt/homebrew/bin/yabai -m space --focus 4; sleep 0.06; /opt/homebrew/bin/yabai -m window --focus $id'

/usr/bin/env bash -lc 'id=$(/opt/homebrew/bin/yabai -m query --windows --window | /opt/homebrew/bin/jq -r .id); /opt/homebrew/bin/yabai -m window --space 8; /opt/homebrew/bin/yabai -m space --focus 8; sleep 0.06; /opt/homebrew/bin/yabai -m window --focus $id'
